languages.text: "Что не взять силой, то можно получить хитроумием. Тот мон-кай был скалой снаружи, но оставил бреши внутри".

traits.locale_text: "Что не взять силой, то можно получить хитроумием. Тот мон-кай был скалой керамита снаружи, но оставил бреши внутри".

languages.text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."
languages.original_text: "Что не взять силой, то можно получить хитроумием. Тот мон-кай был скалой снаружи, но оставил бреши внутри".

traits.locale_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."
"What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

"What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

languages.text: 「力で奪えぬものも、策略によって手に入れることはできる。あのモン＝ケイは外見こそモノリスのように頑強だったが、内なる鎧には綻びがあったのだ」
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: 「力で奪えぬものも、策略によって手に入れることはできる。あのモン＝ケイは外見こそモノリスのように頑強だったが、内なる鎧には綻びがあったのだ」

languages.text: "Was sich nicht mit Gewalt nehmen lässt, kann man durch List in seinen Besitz bringen. Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey erschien von außen wie ein Monolith, doch seine innere Rüstung hatte Risse."
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: "Was sich nicht mit Gewalt nehmen lässt, kann man durch List in seinen Besitz bringen. Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey erschien von außen wie ein Monolith, doch seine innere Rüstung hatte Risse."

languages.text: « Ce qu'il est impossible de prendre de force peut s'obtenir par la ruse. Sous ses apparences de monolithe, ce mon-keigh avait des failles dans son armure. »
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qu'il est impossible de prendre de force peut s'obtenir par la ruse. Sous ses apparences de monolithe, ce mon-keigh avait des failles dans son armure. »

languages.text: «Lo que no puede tomarse por la fuerza es posible obtenerlo mediante la astucia. Ese mon-keigh ofrecía una imagen monolítica, pero había grietas en su armadura interior».
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que no puede tomarse por la fuerza es posible obtenerlo mediante la astucia. Ese mon-keigh ofrecía una imagen monolítica, pero había grietas en su armadura interior».

languages.text: “暴力无法强取的东西，可以通过诡计获得。尽管那只猴子外表看起来坚如磐石，但他内心的护甲却满是裂痕。”
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: “暴力无法强取的东西，可以通过诡计获得。尽管那只猴子外表看起来坚如磐石，但他内心的护甲却满是裂痕。”

languages.text: "Zorla alınamayan, akıl oyunlarıyla elde edilebilir. O mon-keigh dışarıdan monolit gibi görünse de zırhı, içeriden çatlaklarla doluydu."
languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."

traits.locale_text: "Zorla alınamayan, akıl oyunlarıyla elde edilebilir. O mon-keigh dışarıdan monolit gibiydi ama zırhı, içeriden çatlaklarla doluydu."

languages.original_text: "What cannot be taken by force may be obtained through cunning. That mon-keigh appeared as a monolith on the outside, yet he left cracks in his inner armour."
